Classes

struct  sockpp::none
 Type for a result that returns nothing. More...
 
class  sockpp::result< T >
 A result type that can contain a value of any type on successful completion of an operation, or a std::error_code on failure. More...

Detailed Description

Type(s) for return values that can indicate a success or failure.

Date
January 2023
